title: Create case form with full configuration
description: Implement the form for adding a new test case to a suite. This is the most complex form as cases have many configuration options including input JSON, expected tools, and scorer config.
acceptance_criteria: Input field as JSON editor (the query/context to send to agent)
Scorers selection (inherit from suite or override)
scorer_config: JSON editor for advanced config
JSON validation for input and scorer_config
implementation_notes: This is a complex form - consider multi-step or collapsible sections
JSON editor: could use Monaco or simple textarea with validation
Most fields are optional - show sensible defaults
Consider 'Advanced' section for less common fields
CaseForm should work for both create and edit
